summary: A group of young robbers, specializing in robbing shopping center security guards, are raging through out Gothenburg.
cast: Jakob Eklund|Mikael Tornving|Jens Hultén|Meliz Karlge|Oskar Nyman|Antti Reini|Tom Ljungman|Anastasios Soulis|Alexander Karim|Mårten Svedberg|Joel Kinnaman|Ruth Vega Fernandez|Marie Richardson|Zeljko Santrac|Dag Malmberg|Jessica Zandén|Hanna Alsterlund|Jonas Bane|Isidor Alcaide Backlund|Shebly Niavarani|Henrik Johansson|Mathias Hjelm|Natanael Wall Sanktnovius|Karin Bertling|Rasmus Dahlstedt|Linda Hellström|Hanna Ullerstam|Thomas Nilsson|Helena Eliasson|Christian Brandin|Anders Gustavsson|Tony Blom|Ulf Lindberg|Janne Kokki|Suzanna Santrac|Åsa Fång|Dennis Alvdén|Tom Lidgard|Emma Jenséus|Nicole Marouki|Loana Masic|Victoria Levin|Dellie Kamijo|Esther Fälemark|Henrik Tengby|Emmeli Stjärnfeldt|Vide Hedendahl|Moses Hedendahl|Cane Willström|Nikola Stankovic|André Lindholm|Claes Pettersson|Michele Mazzone|Hampus Sikström|Joacim Ek|Nikhie Malmros Wallqvist|Robin Rutström Kugel|Christian Kinell|Dennis Petersen
title: Johan Falk: Barninfiltratören
